property_description:
Townhouse with Sea View in Gated Residential Complex – Carvajal, Benalmádena Costa

Experience relaxed coastal living in this well-maintained, east-facing townhouse with sea views, located in the attractive Carvajal area in a secure, gated complex in Benalmádena Costa. Just a 5-minute walk to the beach and 10-minute walk to Carvajal train station, restaurants, and supermarket, this home is ideally situated with both privacy and easy access to transport and the beach.

The property is part of a quiet complex with shared gardens and a swimming pool. The east-facing orientation provides plenty of morning sun and a bright, inviting home all day long.
You enter the property directly from the outdoor communal area into the top floor, which features:
- A bright and open living and dining area with partial sea views
- A fully equipped kitchen
- A private terrace with sea views
- A guest toilet
- Stairs leading down to the bedroom level and up to the rooftop terrace

On the lower floor you’ll find:
- A spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and access to a small private terrace
- A bright and comfortable guest bedroom
- An additional full bathroom

At the top, the home features a private rooftop terrace with mountain views – perfect for relaxing, dining, or sunbathing. This level also includes a private storage room for extra convenience.

Additional benefits:
- Private parking in the basement
- Large windows with double glazing or security glass in all rooms for great light and natural ventilation
- Located in a well-maintained, gated complex with communal pool and green areas

This is a fantastic opportunity to enjoy the Costa del Sol lifestyle – with comfort, outdoor space, sea and mountains nearby, and walking distance to both beach and public transport.

Charming townhouse in a prime location of Las Lagunas, close to the sports complex, shopping center, schools, pharmacy, parking, and just a few minutes from downtown Fuengirola.

This corner property offers 120 m² of living space, plus a 20 m² patio, perfect for outdoor enjoyment. It also boasts an impressive 60 m² chill-out terrace with a barbecue and jacuzzi, ideal for relaxation or entertaining guests. Additionally, it includes an extra room that can be used as a storage space.

The house features 4 spacious bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. The ground floor includes a welcoming entrance hall, a full bathroom, one bedroom, and an open kitchen that seamlessly connects with the living/dining area. There is also a small second kitchen and a laundry area.

On the first floor, the master bedroom comes with an en-suite bathroom, along with two additional bedrooms and another bathroom. The property has no community fees.

property_description:
A corner with soul in Capellanía – Benalmádena, next to Higuerón

Discover this charming house with Andalusian essence, located in one of the most sought-after and peaceful areas of Benalmádena. A place where peace, light and sea breezes combine to create the perfect home.

With 84 m² of floor space and a generous 300 m² plot, this property offers much more than just square metres: it offers possibilities. It has 2 bedrooms, a spacious and functional bathroom, and a cosy living room with a working fireplace, where you can imagine warm and peaceful winter evenings.

The front garden welcomes you with charm, while the back patio becomes a blank canvas for your dreams: expand the house, create an oasis with a swimming pool or design your personal outdoor retreat.

Located in a peaceful residential area, surrounded by single-family homes, just 5 minutes from the motorway and 7 minutes from the beaches of Torremuelle and Carvajal, living here means having everything close by... but at the same time, feeling like you are far away from noise and stress.

A house full of light, fresh and with incredible potential, ideal for those looking for a place with soul, where every corner inspires and every day begins with a smile.

Cozy 3-Story Townhouse in Good Condition with Urban Views and Private Patio with Barbecue in the Torreblanca Area

Charming 3-story townhouse for sale, located in a quiet community of seven homes. The property is in overall good condition and offers a comfortable and functional space for the whole family.

On the main floor, you'll find the kitchen, the living room, and a smaller room with a balcony — ideal as a home office, guest bedroom, or multipurpose room.

On the lower floor (-1), there are two spacious bedrooms, both with en-suite bathrooms, providing privacy and comfort.

The basement level (-2) includes a private garage with direct access to the home.

The property also features a lovely private patio with a barbecue area — perfect for enjoying outdoor meals and leisure time. The home offers open and pleasant urban views, creating a bright and welcoming atmosphere.

The bus stop is just 50 meters away.

An excellent opportunity for those looking for a functional, well-located home ready to move into.

Bright and Cozy Townhouse in El Paraíso – Ideal for Living or Investment

Discover this charming 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom townhouse spread over two floors, located in one of the most sought-after areas of the Costa del Sol: El Paraíso, in urbanisation Altos del Paraiso. This property stands out for its natural light, comfort, and excellent location — perfect as a permanent residence or a high-return investment.

On the upper floor, you’ll find a spacious bedroom, a full bathroom, and a lovely terrace with views of the communal pool and partial sea views. It’s the perfect spot to enjoy the Mediterranean climate year-round.

The ground floor features the second bedroom, another full bathroom, a cozy living room with a fireplace, and a fully equipped kitchen. From the living room, there is access to another terrace with direct access to the communal garden and pool — an ideal setting for relaxation and outdoor living.

The price includes a parking space conveniently located near the entrance of the townhouse.

Located in a peaceful residential complex yet close to all essential amenities and just 15 minutes from Estepona and 20 minutes from Marbella town center.

A bright, well-located property with great potential.

property_title: Finca - Cortijo in Villanueva De La Concepcion
property_description:
The house is 146 m2 and has two spacious bedrooms on the ground floor and a large attic, which could possibly be converted into two bedrooms.
One bathroom, kitchen, and living room with fireplace. Outside, there is a patio with storage space, a barbecue, and a washing machine.
The house is connected to mains water and electricity.
The driveway belongs to the house, including a carport in front of the house, from which you have spectacular panoramic views.
Then walk 20 meters and you will find a fenced plot. The land is almost entirely flat and has a space prepared for caravan parking. There is a shower and a toilet on the same plot for new owners who want to take advantage of an extra income. The plot measures no less than 18,000 m2 and has 80 Hojiblanca olive trees actively producing extra virgin olive oil.
There are also 40 almond trees.
The house has a water supply.
Ideal for glamping or other activities, or keeping horses.
The property is completely fenced.
The house is located not far from the La Posada EL TORCAL hotel.
In compliance with Andalusian Regional Government Decree 2182005 of October 11, the client is informed that notary, registry, property transfer (ITP), and other fees inherent to the purchase are not included in the price.

Lower Floor:

Upper Floor:
- Two well-designed bedrooms and a second luxurious bathroom with a bathtub.
- An additional sink in the hallway for added convenience.

The newly renovated kitchen combines elegance and functionality, with plenty of storage space. Located just a 7-minute walk from the village and 12 minutes from the metro, this exceptional home offers the perfect combination of elegance, comfort, and practicality. Your ideal home awaits!

property_description:
This southwest-facing house is in a fully private residential complex with three phases in the upper part of Torreblanca. The natural, tranquil, and elevated environment provides beautiful views.

While the house requires some update renovations, it is in good condition and ready for a family to give it the necessary care and attention.

The property has a total of 212.70 m², divided into four floors. It features 3 bedrooms, an attic, 2 bathrooms, and a guest toilet.

The entrance porch to the house, measuring 24.96 m², serves as an uncovered parking space. From here, you access the upper floor of 55.96 m², which consists of three bedrooms, two bathrooms, a rear terrace, and stairs leading to the lower levels and upper attic.

The ground floor, also 55.96 m², includes a fully furnished independent kitchen, a spacious living-dining room with a fireplace, a toilet, an independent porch, and a storage room of 11.33 m². The living room features a large balcony door that opens to a sunny 6.15 m² terrace, with access to a private 13.95 m² patio.

The basement offers a 56.13 m² open space, accessible only via the stairs from the upper level. This area is perfect for hosting gatherings, setting up a gym, a guest area, a children's playroom, or many other possibilities.

Lastly, the attic of 27.21 m² is a small room with access to a 10.54 m² terrace-solarium, offering excellent sea and mountain views.

The community is very peaceful, sharing a swimming pool and garden area to enjoy all the tranquillity and privacy with your loved ones.

It can be accessed from the coast, although there is also a direct connection to the El Higuerón complex, which makes entry and exit to the highway easier.

Don't hesitate to request more information and schedule a visit.

property_description:
A spacious townhouse located on a quiet, wide street with easy access to all the amenities the town has to offer. The property includes a large storage area and garden, featuring a bathroom and a storage room. Additionally, the storage area has a 72m² patio, perfect for enjoying the outdoors.

On the main floor of the home, you’ll find 4 spacious bedrooms, a full bathroom with both a bathtub and shower, a large kitchen with an integrated dining area, a utility room, two interior patios, and a living room with a balcony facing the street, allowing for excellent natural light to bathe the house. All the rooms in the house are exterior facing, ensuring good ventilation and brightness.

From this floor, there is access to a fantastic rooftop terrace with stunning views of the town and the Alhaurín Mountain Range, providing an ideal space to enjoy the surrounding natural landscape.

According to the owner, this property offers the potential to build an additional floor, as well as a small storeroom, making it a great option for those looking to expand the dwelling to suit their needs.

Due to its size, location, and versatility, this property is ideal for a family or as a B&B business, taking advantage of the available space and its excellent location close to all amenities.

property_description:
Spacious 3-Bedroom Townhouse with Breathtaking Views – Alhaurín el Grande

Discover this beautifully presented three-bedroom, three-bathroom townhouse set in a tranquil and picturesque location in Alhaurín el Grande, offering stunning views of the mountains and overlooking the ninth hole of Alhaurin golf course. This spacious home offers the perfect blend of comfort, privacy, and natural beauty across three thoughtfully designed levels.

Top Floor Sanctuary
The entire top floor is dedicated to a luxurious master suite that spans the full width of the rear of the property. Once two separate bedrooms, this expansive space now features abundant built-in wardrobes, a private sitting area with TV, and direct access to a sunny terrace with spectacular mountain and golf course views. The ensuite bathroom includes a combined bath and shower.

Also on this floor is a generous second double bedroom, complete with its own ensuite and charming Juliet balcony that overlooks the front of the property.

Main Living Area
Entering at street level, you're greeted by a welcoming hallway and a guest WC. The bright, open-plan living and dining area features large windows framing the breathtaking views. The fully fitted kitchen flows seamlessly into the dining space, making it ideal for entertaining. Step outside onto a lovely terrace, perfect for morning coffee, then follow the steps down to a larger lower-level terrace, surrounded by bougainvillea and honeysuckle – a true haven of peace and beauty.

Spacious Basement Retreat
The lower level is a hidden gem, offering incredible versatility. It includes a separate laundry room, a large storage room with built-in shelving, and a generous open-plan space currently set up as a home office and entertainment area with a built-in bar. This level also houses a third bedroom and a bathroom with an oversized walk-in shower – ideal for guests or even as a self-contained studio. A staircase leads directly from the basement to the outdoor terraces above.

Additional Features:
• Full security shutters and steel security grilles throughout
• Three spacious bathrooms (all ensuite)
• Exceptional storage space across all levels
• Sunken Terrace area at the front of the property for afternoon sun
• Multiple private terraces with lush, mature planting
• Serene golf course and mountain views
• Off street Parking driveway

The Golf Club house offers a great restaurant and bar, with monthly entertainment on the doorstep. Additionally, there is an independent Pilates Studio and a hairdresser's within the urbanization. The BP Garage is a few minutes away, and there are plenty of great local restaurants and the town of Alhaurin el Grande for shopping.

This well-maintained townhouse is ideal for full-time living, a holiday retreat, or an investment rental opportunity.
Don’t miss the chance to make this unique and spacious property your own.

property_description:
Set in one of the most sought-after areas of Alhaurín Golf, this beautifully presented and much-loved townhouse offers the perfect blend of comfort, style, and convenience. Ideal for permanent living or as a tranquil holiday retreat, the home exudes a welcoming atmosphere from the moment you arrive.
Tucked away at the lower end of the urbanisation, the location couldn’t be better. You’re just a short walk from a variety of excellent restaurants, a well-stocked general store, the Alhaurín Golf Hotel, and a BP service station. With immediate access to main roads, you’ll enjoy effortless connections to Fuengirola, Mijas, Coín, and the heart of Alhaurín El Grande.
Access to the property is easy and secure, with parking located just above the house and three gated entrances—each operated by code or intercom. Whether you’re welcoming guests or coming home from a day out, you’ll appreciate the thoughtful layout and privacy this home offers. Step inside and you’re greeted by a spacious, airy entrance hall that sets the tone for the rest of the house. To the right, there’s a tastefully modernised kitchen, fully refurbished with contemporary finishes. A guest cloakroom and a handy storage closet are also located just off the hall.
Moving through to the main living area, you'll find an unexpectedly spacious open-plan lounge and dining room. Natural light pours in through wide glass sliding doors, opening onto a generous terrace with stunning views of the mountains and La Motta Torre—a peaceful, private space to enjoy your morning coffee or unwind with a sunset cocktail.
A serving hatch between the kitchen and dining area not only adds character but also makes hosting easy, keeping the space bright and open.
Upstairs, a graceful staircase leads to a wide, open landing and three generously sized bedrooms. The master suite features built-in wardrobes, a modern ensuite bathroom, and a private sun terrace—ideal for relaxing in the morning light. The two additional bedrooms also include fitted wardrobes and share a stylish, recently updated family shower room.
Just a 30-second walk from your front door is the community’s charming pool and sunbathing area. Quiet and rarely crowded, thanks to the small number of homes in the development, it’s a serene oasis perfect for cooling off or soaking up the sun.
This home has been meticulously cared for by its current owners and is in immaculate condition throughout. It's being offered for sale only to accommodate a move to a single-level property, making this a rare opportunity to own a truly turnkey home in a prestigious location.

Country property distributed in five 5 independent apartments.

Four of them are on the ground floor and one on the first floor. Each apartment has unique features that make them ideal for both living and rental. The first apartment, close to the pool area, has a double bedroom, kitchen, portable air conditioning, ceiling fan, bathroom and a private terrace. The second apartment has a kitchen, dining area, bedroom with wooden ceilings and bed, bathroom with bathtub and private terrace. The third apartment, spread over two floors, offers a fully equipped kitchen, air-conditioned living room, dining area, full bathroom and an air-conditioned master bedroom on the first floor with double bed and wooden ceilings. The fourth apartment, located on the first floor of the property, includes a kitchen-dining room, dining area, double bedroom and a bathroom with bathtub. Finally, the fifth apartment is smaller and has one bedroom and a bathroom.

The exterior areas are shared and include a swimming pool, large barbecue area and garden. In addition, the property has a storage room and a laundry area. The land, completely fenced and flat, has water from a private well and the community irrigation canal.

Ideal for those looking for privacy and tranquility, rental business or equestrian property. Located on the north side of Coin, 15 minutes drive from the village.

property_description:
Introducing a charming townhouse located in Puerto Romano, a peaceful residential area situated in El Padrón, to the east of Estepona. The property is just a 5-minute drive from the beach and 10 minutes from the center of Estepona, offering both convenience and privacy in a natural setting.

Built on a 189 m² plot, the property features a spacious outdoor patio from which a staircase leads to the main residence, positioned above street level. The entrance is preceded by a bright, enclosed porch, ideal as an additional dining area or lounge. From this space, you can access the living room with a fireplace on one side, and the independent kitchen on the other, which also connects to the living room through an internal door. Adjacent to the living room, a bedroom with an en-suite bathroom completes this floor, while a spiral staircase leads to the upper level, where the second bedroom is located, also with a private bathroom and access to a large terrace with open and partial sea views.

On the lower floor of the house, with independent side access from the patio, there is a studio with a private bathroom, perfect for guests, family members, or as a workspace, as well as a laundry area and a separate, ventilated storage room. Although the property is in good condition and perfectly habitable, it allows for some aesthetic updates to modernize, improve, and adapt it to personal preferences.

The house is equipped with individual air conditioning units in several rooms and solar panels. While it does not have a garage, it is located on a private street with little traffic, making parking easy. Its proximity to the sea, the beach, and the town center, as well as its tranquil atmosphere, make this property a very attractive option both as a permanent residence and for getaways to the Costa del Sol.

property_description: Traditional townhouse located in the center of Alhaurin el Grande. property_description:
Unique opportunity to create your own holiday park! Just 35 km from Málaga Airport and 5 km from the picturesque village of Casarabonela, this unique complex consists of four separate buildings. There is a 91m² main house and three additional buildings, ideal for rental as holiday apartments.

One of these three additional buildings has already been completed and is ready for rental. The other two still need a bathroom and possibly a kitchenette/kitchen installed. The property is located in a natural setting with stunning views and borders a small river. An unpaved road winds from the main road across the 15,000m² plot to a spacious parking area.

Behind the first guest accommodation is a 25m² swimming pool and a technical room housing the inverter for the solar panels and the accompanying batteries. The current owners have chosen not to connect to the electricity grid, although this option is available for the new owner if desired. The property has an AFO certificate, which also allows for an application to connect to the electricity grid.

The main house has been fully renovated and features a covered veranda across the entire front. Next to the house, there is an underground water storage tank. The property is connected to municipal water and also has access to irrigation water. Surrounding the four buildings are various fruit trees.

A paved road leads to the three holiday homes, each of which has its own private terrace and breathtaking views.

A place to fall in love with!

property_description:
A beautiful townhouse with a large private garden and fantastic terrace, overlooking the fairways of Duquesa Golf. This is located in the highly desirable community Villas del Golf, a pleasant walk away from Duquesa Marina.

Located in a well-established, gated community featuring low-rise townhouses arranged around a spacious communal swimming pool. From here, a pleasant stroll takes you to the picturesque marina of La Duquesa, the charming seaside village of Castillo, and the unspoiled sandy beaches of the Mediterranean coastline. La Duquesa is a vibrant harbour offering a variety of shops, boutiques, bars, and restaurants. It’s a hub for both sea and land-based activities and is surrounded by numerous championship golf courses. In the evenings, the area comes alive with a lively yet relaxed atmosphere, appealing to all ages. In contrast, Castillo exudes a traditional village charm and is particularly known for its excellent fish restaurants. A further ten-minute walk along the seafront promenade brings you to Sabinillas, a bustling fishing village with an array of supermarkets, banks, shops, tapas bars, and restaurants. The area benefits from excellent road connections to Estepona and Marbella, with Malaga International Airport less than an hour away and Gibraltar Airport just 25 minutes by car.

Upon entering the property, you’re welcomed by a charming porch area with comfortable seating, perfect for enjoying a morning coffee. Step inside to find the kitchen positioned to the right, offering a functional layout ideal for everyday living.
The entrance opens into a bright and spacious open-plan living and dining area, designed for both relaxing and entertaining. Large glass doors from the lounge lead out to a generous private terrace and garden, seamlessly blending indoor and outdoor living.
Upstairs, the home offers three double bedrooms, all featuring fitted wardrobes. The main bedroom boasts a private ensuite bathroom and access to a covered private terrace, ideal for quiet moments or soaking in the surrounding views. A modern family bathroom serves the remaining two bedrooms on this level.
This property also benefits from a fantastic basement space, complete with a brand new kitchen and bathroom, offering great potential for a guest suite, games room, or home office.
Additional features include a private carport for parking and access to a secure, gated community.

This home offers multiple outdoor spaces designed for relaxation and entertaining. At the entrance, a welcoming front porch with a seating area provides the ideal spot to unwind and enjoy the surroundings.
To the rear, you'll find a spacious private garden, beautifully landscaped and well-maintained, featuring a large covered terrace—perfect for al fresco dining, entertaining guests, or simply enjoying the peaceful atmosphere.
Upstairs, the main bedroom opens onto a private terrace with elevated views over the garden, the golf course, and extending towards the sea—a serene setting to enjoy your morning coffee or watch the sunset in complete privacy.

From the roundabout at the end of the road, there is easy direct access to both Estepona (8 minutes) and San Pedro/Marbella, making commuting or exploring the coast effortless. The area is also well-connected by local public transport, adding to the home’s overall convenience and accessibility.

The home includes two parking spaces and easy access to the AP7 toll road. Best of all, the beach, shops and restaurants are just a 6-minute drive away.

property_description:
Discover this charming 3-bedroom townhouse located in Marina de Casares, one of the most pleasant and peaceful residential areas of Casares Playa. With a built area of 127 m² and an additional 91 m² of terraces, this home offers space, functionality, and a privileged setting just a 5-minute walk (around 400 meters) from the beach.

The property is fully furnished and move-in ready. It features marble floors, an elegant fireplace in the living room, a kitchen equipped with an electric hob, three well-proportioned bedrooms, two full bathrooms, and an additional guest toilet. The layout is ideal for families or those seeking a comfortable holiday home with bright interiors and spacious outdoor areas to enjoy the Costa del Sol’s wonderful climate.

From the solarium, you can enjoy sea views, as well as views over the gardens and the communal pool. The property also includes a storage room and street parking just outside the entrance. The gated residential complex offers an adult pool, children’s pool, garden areas, and a BBQ zone – all designed for family enjoyment and relaxation.

Location is one of this property’s best assets. The beach and Casares promenade are just a 5-minute walk away, offering direct access to beach bars and restaurants. Lidl supermarket and other shops are less than 2 minutes by car, and the lively Puerto de La Duquesa with its range of bars and restaurants is only 5 minutes away. Golf lovers will appreciate the proximity to courses like Doña Julia and Finca Cortesín, both less than 10 minutes away. Estepona town center is just 12 minutes by car and Marbella is around 30 minutes.

The community fees are very reasonable (€90/month) and the annual property tax (IBI) is €693, making this property a financially attractive option as well.

In short, this townhouse in Marina de Casares is the perfect opportunity for anyone wanting to live by the sea in a quiet yet well-connected setting, with all services close at hand and a relaxed Mediterranean lifestyle.

Rooftop terrace of 35 m² with open views of the Sierra de Mijas and the urbanisation’s green areas.

• Open-plan kitchen

property_description:
Welcome to the COUNTS House

. Steeped in history
. Character Property
. Popular Village
. CULTURE, CULTURE
. TRADITIONAL Spanish Environment
. Possible Rural Tourism Opportunity

Built around the year 1500, this was either the 1st or the 2nd house of Guaro.
The rest of the village organically grew around it.

Before that time, Guaro was a tiny village around a Moorish castle on the hills 3 kms further. The richest farmers settled far out of the village, against a hillside shielding them against the sun.
Possibly for the need of work force they erected a small church here too... and it is here that current day Guaro started to grow after the fall of the Moors.

In 1614 Guaro was given the royal title of 'Villa'. This was done by King Felipe IV of Spain. Such title was usually for a village that had shown exceptional courage or assistance in the Christian Reconquista on the Moors.
It was at this moment that Guaro became a County and a trusted statesman from Madrid, Don Juan Chumacero de Sotoymayor y Carrillo, was elevated to Count of Guaro.

The water well on the patio still points to the magnificent history of the mansion, just as a room specifically dedicated to the curing of olives does.

When the counts left the village, some 100 years ago, the house became the cradle of all members of a Guarenian family, most of whom were born or raised here.

In the year 2000 the mansion was fully renovated.

When you enter the main house, you instantly see the first, narrow patio in front of you as well as the larger patio behind it.
On the left you have a lounge and on the right a room that was last used as a bedroom. A kitchen, bathroom and an olive atelier make this first floor complete.
On the second floor there are 3 bedrooms (2 double, 1 single) and a bathroom.
On the third floor a spacious loft.

The entrance to the guest apartment is on the side of the building.
The front door gives way to a staircase that leads to the 1st floor where this apartment is situated.
It exists of a kitchen, a lounge, 2 bedrooms and a bathroom.

This apartment can be reconnected with the main house, by creating a staircase to the patio downstairs.

Parking is in the street - and rather special for an Andalusian mountain village: it does not take much practise to drive to the property: there are no steep alleys.
It is in a fully flat part of the village, with grocery stores at a one minute walk, and bars at 3 minutes.
Guaro is a modest white village, located on the edge of the Sierra de las Nieves natural park. Thanks to its elevated position, at over 350 metres above sea level, the village offers privileged views across the surrounding countryside.

The area is known for producing almonds and olives, which is an important part of the local economy. Guaro has it ́s own olive mill, where locals have their harvests pressed. It is the ideal spot for outdoor lovers, which also offers a few famous cultural activities like the Luna Mora festival in September. Like many white villages in Andalucia, the village dates back to the Arabic occupation of Spain.


Guaro is located 55 minutes (50 km) from the city of Málaga and the airport and the beaches of the Costa del Sol (Marbella) are only a 35 minute (24 km.) drive away!

property_description:
A fabulous Andalucian-style townhouse in Manilva Village with stunning panoramic views over the vineyards, across to the mountains and sea. A stunning setting. Located in a small urbanisation of only 23 houses with a communal pool and gardens.

A lovely large home with lots of space and storage, and located in a peaceful area, yet within walking distance of all amenities in Manilva Village.

There is an entrance gate for cars and a pedestrian door to enter the property. You enter the property to a big courtyard with carport where you can fit at least three cars. From the terrace/courtyard, there are steps leading down to a basement and stairs leading up to the main house.

Whilst officially a three-bedroom house, the present owners have built an extension that can be used as a fourth bedroom.

As you enter the house there is a large spacious living/dining room with a split level. The living area has a wood-burning fire making it very cosy on winter evenings. There is air-conditioning in the lounge. There are two sets of double balcony doors leading out from here to the terrace. The terrace is a lovely area with an awning so that you have shaded and unshaded areas. A stunning spot to dine al fresco whilst soaking up the mountain air, and taking in the beautiful sea views. There is also a view of the communal pool. Tucked away in the corner is access to a utility room.

The kitchen is a separate room but there is a sliding door that enables one to tuck the door away and give it more of an open-plan feel. The kitchen is fully fitted and has a double sink above which there is a large window with stunning views across to Casares village. Imagine doing the washing up whilst looking right out to the mystical mountains. Truly breathtaking.

On this level, the owners have added an extension which is an office/small bedroom with an ensuite shower room and fitted wardrobes.

The first floor is home to three bedrooms and one bathroom. All bedrooms have balcony doors, are bright, and have excellent views. The main bedroom has a walk-in wardrobe and a balcony, is south-facing and has stunning views of the sea and across to the vineyards and mountains. The second bedroom has fitted wardrobes, a Juliet balcony and also has amazing sea views. The family bathroom has been refurbished and is modern with a walk-in shower. Even from here, there are stunning mountain views to the mountain range, Sierra Bermeja. The third bedroom is a double bedroom with fitted wardrobes and a private terrace. The views are beautiful over the pool, across the vineyards and to the sea.

The basement of this house is actually at ground level with natural light and makes up the whole footprint of the house. There is a toilet and the owners are using it as a gym and for storage. There are so many possibilities and different uses for this space. The owners have also built a storeroom under the stairs which is very useful.

This is a fabulous house which would make the perfect family home. Whilst in a quiet residential area, you are within walking distance of the village, its restaurants, school, music school, sports complex, medical centre, banks etc. And whilst located in a white-washed village you are literally a 5-minute drive from the coast, giving you the best of both worlds. In 5 minutes you can be at the beach, in Marina de la Duquesa or in Sabinillas town.

Come view with me!

property_description:
Welcome to a beautiful finca perfectly nestled between the picturesque villages of Tolox and Alozaina, offering a fantastic mix of rustic living and modern comfort.

The main house has been carefully updated over time: brand new windows, a new hot & cold A/C system, pool maintenance done, and many other improvements – making it move-in ready for the next lucky owner.

One of the nice extras of this property is a lovely garden house / cabin located next to the main house. It offers multiple possibilities: it can serve as an extra bedroom for guests, a cozy storage space, a workshop, or even be converted into a sauna — depending on your needs.

Set on a large south-facing plot with breathtaking, open views, the finca features:

3 bedrooms & 2 bathrooms
Spacious living areas
Most of the windows open directly onto the terrace and pool area, creating a fantastic open-plan indoor-outdoor living space — perfect for entertaining or simply enjoying the peaceful views
Covered terrace ideal for al fresco dining
Outdoor BBQ and fully tiled pool area
Private driveway with electric gate & parking for 4 cars
What truly makes this property special is the vibrant and well-maintained garden full of life. You'll find a wide variety of fruit trees including olives (26 trees), figs, pomegranate, rose pepper, oranges, lemons, pomelos, quince, almonds, apples, and even grapes. On top of that, the garden bursts with blooming roses, colorful flowers, and lush bushes that change with the seasons. All of this set against a stunning backdrop of mountains and the beautiful Andalusian landscape.

Access to the property is easy via a 2 km mostly concreted track — pure privacy and serenity.

About the Location:
The finca sits just a short drive from both Tolox and Alozaina.
Tolox, nestled in Sierra de las Nieves Natural Park, offers endless hiking, incredible nature, historic whitewashed streets, and natural spring spas for relaxation. It’s the perfect blend of authentic Andalusian life with easy access to the Costa del Sol beaches within an hour.

property_description:
Authentic villa with panoramic views of El Torcal – including two casitas

Just a ten-minute drive from the lively village of Villanueva de la Concepción, this charming detached villa offers stunning views of El Torcal – an impressive natural area known for its rugged limestone formations, rare flora, and spectacular hiking trails. Here you can enjoy peace, space, and the authentic atmosphere of the Andalusian countryside, while still being close to local amenities.

Built in 1995, the villa stands on an almost fully fenced, flat plot of no less than 5,267 m². The main house of 112 m² features three comfortable bedrooms, each with its own en-suite bathroom. One of these bedrooms also has a separate entrance from outside, making it ideal for creating an additional guest apartment or rental unit. The living room in the main house is warmed by a cozy wood-burning stove, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere on cooler evenings, and a heating and cooling air conditioning system ensures comfort throughout the year. All bedrooms, as well as the two casitas, are also equipped with air conditioning.

Next to the main house are two fully furnished casitas measuring 28 m² and 22 m², perfect for immediate tourist rental. The sale includes the full inventory, meaning you can start renting out immediately without any additional investment.

The beautiful garden features a generous swimming pool of nearly 50 m², equipped with a brand-new pump. It is a concrete pool with a liner, so also possible to tile it. Adjacent to the pool, you will find a charming outdoor kitchen and a practical laundry area – everything you need to fully enjoy outdoor living. In front of the house is an enclosed conservatory overlooking the green garden, providing extra living space in every season.

The property is surrounded by fifteen different varieties of mature fruit trees, including plum, apple, walnut, cherry, lemon, lime, apricot and mulberry. The kitchen in the main house is equipped with all necessary appliances and offers plenty of space. The spacious living room is the heart of the home and, like the rest of the property, features double glazing. Hot water is supplied via propane gas geysers, except for one bathroom, which uses an electric boiler. The property is connected to the municipal water and electricity network.

This unique home not only offers a comfortable and inviting living environment but also excellent opportunities for tourist rental. Everything is already in place – you just need to turn the key.

property_description:
CHARMING TOWNHOUSE WITH EXCELLENT LOCATION IN EL COTO – MIJAS COSTA

At the entrance of El Coto, one of the most practical and peaceful residential areas in Mijas Costa, we find this charming townhouse, lovingly cared for by its sole owner for many years. It’s one of those homes that are hard to find nowadays: well-maintained, functional, and with a warm atmosphere you can feel the moment you walk in.

It offers direct access from the garage to the interior of the house via an internal staircase, providing comfort and privacy.

Just a short walk away you will find supermarkets, schools, restaurants, and public transport, and in only 5 minutes by car you can be in the centre of Fuengirola and on the beach. Its direct connection to the A-7 also allows you to reach Málaga Airport in around 20 minutes.

Layout:

Main floor: entrance hall, guest toilet, independent kitchen, and living-dining room with fireplace, with access to a private terrace with pergola that connects directly to the garden and communal pool.

First floor: three double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes; the master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, plus a second full bathroom. Balconies with views of the garden and pool.

Basement: private garage with space for 1.5 cars and direct access to the house via an internal staircase.

⚙️ Features and extras: gated community with swimming pool, landscaped gardens, and paddle tennis court; the urbanisation has private surveillance cameras. Central air conditioning on the upper floor, split unit in the living room, double glazing, solar panels for hot water, and ceramic tile floors.

Thanks to its location, layout, and features, this property is ideal as a permanent family home, a second residence to enjoy the climate and beaches of the Costa del Sol, or as a long-term rental investment.

Our agent fees are included in the sale price. The price does not include costs associated with the purchase, such as notary, registration, and taxes related to the transfer (ITP, VAT, AJD). Furniture is not included in the price.

property_description:
Bright and spacious three-storey townhouse, located in the charming Sitio de Calahonda. Just a short walk from the vibrant shopping centres and delicious restaurants along Avenida de España, this property is perfect for those seeking comfort and style.

With four bedrooms and four bathrooms, it includes a spacious living room with a fireplace that opens directly onto a large terrace where you can enjoy panoramic sea views while relaxing next to your barbecue area. The spacious kitchen is ideal for those who enjoy cooking and entertaining friends or family. Take advantage of the two private suites on the upper floor, each with its own private terrace from which to admire the deep blue ocean. One even has a private jacuzzi, perfect for special moments. It also has a complete independent studio apartment: a cosy bedroom, functional kitchenette and modern bathroom.

This urbanization also offers beautiful, meticulously maintained communal gardens and a swimming pool surrounded by lush vegetation for your most relaxing days. The price includes an underground parking space (closed garage) in La Siesta 2, just a few meters from the house. Possibility of creating a private parking space in front of the house. In summary: enjoy incredible sea views from almost the entire property, natural light all day long, and versatile spaces that can be adapted to your needs. Its unbeatable location allows you to walk to both supermarkets and beaches!

Don't miss out on this opportunity!

property_description:
This lovely property is located just outside El Burgo, in an area of natural beauty approximately 50 minutes from Malaga airport and the coast and 40 minutes from the lakes in Ardarles and El Caminito del Rey in El Chorro making it ideal for rural tourism.
Set in land of around 97,000m2 with olive trees, almond trees as well as fig, pomegranate and other fruit trees this could bring in an income.
There are many large barns /outbuildings (one is approx. 100m2)
Although there is currently no pool there is plenty of space for one.
The house has a pretty rear courtyard patio, so typical of traditional Spanish properties, with a shady seating area and a laundry room. The front of the house has a covered terrace area.
The lower level of the house has an open kitchen with a large Range oven and fitted units and a good sized lounge /diner with open fireplace. There are 2 bedrooms on the ground floor, both have en-suite bathrooms and fitted wardrobes.
Upstairs is another lounge with patio doors onto a terrace with the most amazing views, the lounge has wood beamed ceilings and a wood burner fireplace. There are 2 good sized bedrooms on this floor (one currently used as an office) plus a family bathroom with loft space above.
The property has mains electricity, full gas central heating throughout, a water filter system, well water, and internet.

The Real Estate Agent, acting on behalf of the vendor, provides these particulars as a guide for potential purchasers and not as an offer or contract in in any form. Reasonable efforts have been made to ensure the accuracy of the information provided, but potential purchasers are advised to verify each statement through inspection, searches, inquiries, and surveys.

This modern and bright 4-bedroom semi-detached house with a rooftop solarium is located in the Las Lomas de Riviera Club complex, Riviera del Sol.
The property consists of a living/dining room with fireplace, large kitchen with separate laundry room, 4 bedrooms, the master with an en-suite bathroom, jacuzzi, two bathrooms and a guest toilet. A/C, large storage areas, outdoor shower, several terraces, a large garden with fruit trees, built-in barbecue and outdoor dining room, a solarium with panoramic views of Riviera del Sol and the sea.
This property has a 43-meter private parking lot with capacity for 2 vehicles.

The complex is very well maintained with three communal swimming pools, manicured communal gardens with a fish pond, basketball/soccer court, paddle tennis and communal parking areas.

It really is an ideal family property, with low maintenance costs.

Just 5 minutes drive from the shops, restaurants and beaches of Riviera del Sol, Miraflores, Calahonda, Torrenueva and La Cala de Mijas.

property_description:
Renovated Villa in Calahonda with Pool, Garden, & Roof Terrace

This fully renovated link-detached villa in lower Calahonda is just a 20-minute walk to local amenities and another 10 minutes to the beach. It features modern design, large windows that let in plenty of natural light, and a private entrance leading to a front courtyard.

Inside, on the entrance level we find an open-plan living area with a modern kitchen and lounge, guest cloakroom and an additional room that can be used as an office or storage. On the lower level, there are two bedrooms, each with its own bathroom. The master bedroom has an ensuite bathroom and a walk-in wardrobe. Upstairs, there’s a roof terrace with sea views, and the garden level offers extra living space.

The villa also includes a private pool and garden, great for relaxing or entertaining. On the lower level, there’s a flexible room that could be used as a games room, cinema, gym, or third bedroom. This property is in a convenient location and offers plenty of options for comfortable living.

Summary:

Fully renovated villa in sought-after Lower Calahonda
Prime location: 20-minute walk to amenities, 10 more to the beach
Spacious open-plan living with modern kitchen and large windows
Two bedrooms on the lower level, master with walk-in wardrobe and ensuite
Flexible additional room for office, games, gym, or cinema
Rooftop terrace with stunning sea views
Private garden with a pool for outdoor enjoyment

property_description:
Exceptional Opportunity to Build Your Dream Villa in Valle Romano, fully licenced plot.

Discover a rare chance to create your perfect home in the exclusive and highly sought-after private urbanization of Valle Romano. This generously sized corner plot is the result of combining two separate parcels, offering ample space and an exceptional location with panoramic south-facing views over lush golf greens, rolling hills, majestic mountains, and the shimmering Mediterranean Sea.

The residential plot is sold with a fully authorized and licensed building project, ready for immediate construction. It's an ideal investment to develop a cutting-edge contemporary villa featuring the latest in smart home technology (domóticos), all at a significantly lower cost than purchasing a finished property. The building costs are not included.

Designed with elegance and functionality in mind, the project includes:
- 3 spacious bedrooms, each with en-suite bathrooms
- 2 guest toilets
- Open-plan kitchen, living, and dining areas
- Expansive semi-covered terrace
- Large private swimming pool and surrounding garden
- Elevator and wheelchair-friendly access
- Underfloor heating and electric shutters
- Solarium and generous basement for custom entertainment or leisure space
- Separate laundry room
- Underground garage and covered outdoor parking

Situated between Valle Romano Golf and Azata Golf Clubs, the urbanization ensures a secure and tranquil lifestyle, just minutes from essential amenities. The new Estepona International Hospital is only 2.3 km away, with beaches, shops, restaurants, and supermarkets within a 2–3 km radius. The Marina and Port of Estepona are also just 3 km away, placing leisure and luxury at your doorstep.

For international access, Gibraltar is a 35-minute drive and Málaga just one hour away.

This is more than just a plot—it’s a chance to bring your vision to life in one of the Costa del Sol’s most prestigious settings.
An opportunity not to be missed!

property_description:
Great Opportunity in the Heart of Los Boliches!
We are pleased to present this property with huge potential, located in one of the most sought-after areas of Fuengirola: right in the center of Los Boliches, just steps away from supermarkets, schools, public transport, restaurants, leisure areas, and of course, just minutes from the beach.

This is a townhouse distributed over two floors plus a private rooftop terrace, with excellent orientation and many possibilities for renovation and customization.

Ground floor:
We enter through a charming front patio. Inside, there is a spacious living room, a separate kitchen (with the possibility to open it up to the living area), a full bathroom, and a rear patio with laundry area, ideal for relaxing or creating a small urban garden.

First floor:
There are four bedrooms, all exterior and bright, and a full bathroom.

Second floor / rooftop:
The upper floor features an attic-style space that can be used as a studio, storage, or leisure area, and a private rooftop terrace with lovely open views, perfect for enjoying the sun or creating a chill-out space.

Extras and features:
Communal swimming pool

Bright home with excellent cross ventilation

Ideal as a permanent residence or investment property

Quiet yet central location

Renovation needed, allowing you to design the home of your dreams

This is a great opportunity to create the perfect home in one of the most desirable areas of the Costa del Sol.
